Introduction
This topic contains information on adjusting an award for authorized absences and non-bed care status, including
adjusting for authorized absences in Section 306 Pension cases
restoring the full rate for absences of 30 days or more
reducing Section 306 Pension upon a Veteran’s return from an authorized absence
adjusting an award for absences of less than 30 days
, and
restoring full pension rates because of hardship
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Adjusting Pension Under 38 CFR 3.551 and 3.556
citation: Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
